name: CountryBowl
description:
The goal of the game is to move around the world map, picking up and placing countries around certain continent areas. Each country has a happiness level which may be raised by their position or by countries around them. Continents need to maintain a net happiness level over time. The game ends when a continent spends an excessive amount of time without a net increase.

The purpose of the game is to last as long as possible. Certain arrangements of countries can be used to maximize the time you have to create a happiness increase.

Made by sirivanbiscuit
